service: task-management

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: us-east-1
  environment:
    AWS_REGION: us-east-1
    DB_HOST: ${env.DB_HOST}
    PORT: ${env.PORT}
    DB_USER: ${env.DB_USER}
    DB_PASSWORD: ${env.DB_PASSWORD}
    DB_NAME: ${env.DB_NAME}

functions:
  app:
    handler: handler.main  # Debe coincidir con la exportaci√≥n en handler.js
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /tasks
          method: GET
      - httpApi:
          path: /tasks
          method: POST

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
